subject: Revision of norms/ guidelines for engagement of manpower on short term basis in the field offices of NHAI.
text: HRy <7ely <TTHRf xifedrut 744 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 4 (em 4det 3_{Tf mTT4) 47 / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 HhI National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) v-5 Qd 6, #r-10, Ed, T8 feat-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAII Policy Guidelines/ Engagement %f Manpower on Short Term Basis 2019 No:1.3.3.27/2019 dated the 09" August, 2019 [Decision taken in SplEC Meeting held on 15.05.2019 at agenda item no. 1.2 and on File No.11035/02/2016-Admn. of Division] Sub: Revision of normsl guidelines for engagement of manpower on short term basis in the field offices of NHAI: To meet the requirement of  manpower, particularly the support staff, the field offices of NHAI were allowed in terms of Policy Guidelines no. 11012/13/99- Admn: dated 29.03.2000 of NHAI, as revised from time to time, to engage short-term staff through placement agencies' as a stop-gap arrangement in case when there is an urgent requirement and the field offices cannot wait till the regular staff are provided by NHAI, HQ: It was observed that the existing norms had become redundant in the context of present requirement of   support staff and also keeping in view the revised set-up of field offices of NHAI . Considering these aspects, a need was felt to revise the norms. Accordingly a detailed exercise was carried out by a Committee of Senior Officers of NHAI. 2. Based on the recommendations of the Committee and with the approval of the Competent   Authority, the following   guidelines are issued in  supersession of all previous guidelines on the subject. Standard Manpower requirements for engagement of support staff in PIUs & Regional Offices and their eligibility conditions along with the modalities; terms & conditions of their engagement, as mentioned below, become operational with immediate effect: 2.1 Norms for Standard Manpower prescribed for field offices: The norms of  support staff to be engaged in ROs are given at Annex-1 , Appendix-1A, 1B & 1C. Besides the Office Assistant, ROs may hire a record keeping agency for record management, o the lines of record keeping agency hired at NHAI, HQ (ii) The norms of support staff to be engaged in PIUs are given at Annex-2 & Appendix-ZA. (iii) The norms of support staff to be engaged in Site Offices are given at Annex-3 2.2 The support staff as per prescribed norms shall be engaged oly through the Outsourcing / Placement Agencies. The support staff so deployed by the outsourcing Iplacement agencies shall be on the payrolls of such agencies. In the event; the NHAI is not satisfied with the services of any of the  support staff  deployed by the outsourcing placement  agencies; such support staff shall be replaced by the agency(s) within a maximum period of 15 2.3 Educational Qualifications and other eligibility conditions: The details of educational qualifications and experience , post-wise are given in Annex-4.
